Scene:
Bewitched by a Fox
(Wada no bessho keshō yashiki / 和田別所化性屋敷)

Play: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (本朝廿四孝)

Production: October 1969

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))
